Security at your service

We offer a wide range of systems for burglar alarms, fire alarms, access control, central station monitoring, video surveillance, and more. Our trained sales personnel and technicians will work within your budget and provide the right solution for you ...

Investigative Solutions

Protect your life

Every customer, whether they be commercial, residential, or industrial gets individualized attention. We are proud to be the chosen security specialist for some of Charlotte's commercial facilities and residences. We are equally proud of the record of trust and reliability we have built with individual homeowners and businesses throughout the area.

Our Mission

Why you should choose us over our competitors

We use our experience, knowledge and expertise in the field of Security and Private Investigations to develop, implement and install effective solutions that protect the homes, families and assets of our clients and the properties, inventory and employees of local businesses; while striving for excellence in service and value.

Our Partners

The best companies in the security industry

Security Consult, Inc. partners with the best companies in the security industry to serve you with superior quality products. We strive for perfection and are always up to date with the latest technologies. Even if your product isn't listed we can still service your equipment!

Testimonial

Install, Service, or Repair Surveillance Cameras

June 13, 2014

Rachel J from Charlotte, NC says: Julius is an outstanding and professional service provider. He & his team installed an outdoor security system over a large area. He made sure that all of our needs were met at all phases: sale, installation, and even after the system was installed. We have worked with several contractors and many of them have lacked customer service skills, professionalism, and common courtesy. Julius and his team had to dig trenches and bring along tools/equipment, but they were careful not to damage our property and did not leave debris behind. Security Consult is a great business to work with!
